metadata.title: CVE-2020-22218 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function _libssh2_packet_add in libssh2 1.10.0allows attackers to access out of bounds memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh2-1 - 1.10.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.0-2').
